meanings.definition: (plural only) the opening words of each of the blessings in the Sermon on the Mount, in the Gospel of Matthew.
meanings.english_definition: The opening words of each of the blessings in the Sermon on the Mount, in the Gospel of Matthew.

examples.sentence: The Beati are a central part of Christian teaching.
examples.translation: 『真福九端』はキリスト教の教えの中心的な部分です。

etymology.value: From Latin beātī, plural of beātus (“blessed, happy”).
